name: Doodle Fight!
description:
Enter into a doodle world where never-ending zombies attempt to eat your brains out! Wow, now that was allot! Now anyways please admire the awesome game and graphics while keeping in mind the project is in beta.

Controls, WASD and Arrow Keys to move, Click/Press and hold to shoot, and r  to reload(or run out of "machine reload"  to reload.

Updates will be happening frequently! The more views, downloads, and donations the game gets the more updates so please share the game with your friends!
